summary: Given a sequence of elements, this function creates a list of [index, element] pairs.
returns: Return an immutable list of lists such that each inner list is a [index, element] pair.
details: The inner lists of pairs are immutable.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val planets = [%22Mercury%22, %22Venus%22, %22Earth%22, %22Mars%22];%0A%0A    val result = F::enumerate(planets);%0A%0A    F::println(result);%0A}
